title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid input data and receive confirmation of account creation.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid user details including email, username, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that registration is successful and user is redirected to the appropriate page or shown confirmation.

title: User Registration with Invalid Email Format
description: Ensure that the registration fails if the user inputs an invalid email format and a proper error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input an invalid email format along with other valid fields.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm that an appropriate error message is shown indicating invalid email.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that existing users can log in successfully with correct username/email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login succeeds and user is directed to the authenticated area.

title: User Login with Incorrect Password
description: Validate that login fails when the user inputs incorrect password and error is handled gracefully.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email but incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Check that appropriate error message is displayed and user remains on login page.

title: Session Persistence after Login
description: Ensure that the user session persists after logging in and remains active across page reloads and browser restarts.

steps.description: Log in with valid user credentials.
Reload the application or close and reopen the browser.
Verify that user remains logged in without needing to re-enter credentials.

title: Create New Company Data
description: Verify that authenticated users can create a new company record using the company management interface.

steps.description: Login as an authenticated user.
Navigate to the company management section.
Enter valid details to add a new company.
Submit the company creation form.
Confirm that the new company appears in the list and is saved correctly.

title: Edit Existing Company Data
description: Confirm that authenticated users can edit the details of an existing company and the changes are persisted.

steps.description: Log in as an authenticated user.
Navigate to the company management interface.
Select an existing company and change one or more fields.
Save the changes.
Verify that edits are saved and displayed correctly in the company list.

title: Delete Company Data with Confirmation
description: Validate that users can delete a company record after confirmation and it is removed from the list.

steps.description: Login and navigate to company management.
Initiate deletion of an existing company.
Confirm the deletion action.
Ensure the company is removed from the listing and no longer retrievable.

title: Public Home Page Loads and Displays Content
description: Verify the public home page loads successfully and displays the intended overview and visitor engagement content.

steps.description: Open the application URL as an unauthenticated visitor.
Confirm that the home page loads without errors and shows welcome content.

title: Blog Post List Displays Correctly
description: Ensure that the blog section lists available blog posts accurately with title, date, and snippet.

steps.description: Navigate to the blog page.
Verify that blog posts render correctly with all required metadata for each post.

title: View Single Blog Post Content
description: Check that selecting a blog post opens the full post content without errors and with correct formatting.

steps.description: From the blog listing page, select a blog post.
Verify full blog post content displays including text, images, and metadata.

title: API Integration Success on Data Fetch
description: Confirm that the application successfully fetches data from backend APIs for user authentication and company info without errors.

steps.description: Trigger data fetch on login and company management components.
Validate API responses are received, parsed, and data displayed accordingly.

title: Graceful API Error Handling
description: Test that the application handles backend API errors (such as 4xx, 5xx responses, or timeouts) gracefully, showing user-friendly error messages.

steps.description: Simulate API errors during authentication and company data requests.
Confirm that appropriate error messages or fallback UI are displayed and application remains stable.

title: UI Components Render Consistently Across Themes
description: Verify that reusable UI components render consistently and correctly under different application themes.

steps.description: Switch application themes through the theme context or settings.
Check that all UI components adapt styling without visual glitches or layout problems.

title: Application Theming Switch and Persistence
description: Ensure the user can switch between defined application themes and the selected theme persists across sessions.

steps.description: Change the theme from default to alternate available themes.
Verify theme changes apply immediately and are retained after page reload or new session.

title: Unauthorized Access Restriction to Company Management
description: Validate that unauthenticated users cannot access company management features and are redirected or shown access denied messages.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate to company management pages without logging in.
Confirm the user is redirected to login or an access denied message is shown.

title: Session Timeout and Reauthentication
description: Check that when a user session expires, the application requires reauthentication before allowing access to protected features.

steps.description: Log in and simulate session expiration.
Attempt to access authenticated sections like company management.
Verify that the user is prompted to log in again and cannot proceed without valid session.

title: Responsive Layout on Various Screen Sizes
description: Verify that the application layout and components render correctly across multiple devices and screen sizes without layout breakage.

steps.description: Open the application on mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes.
Check that UI elements are properly arranged, readable, and interactive on all screen sizes.

title: Form Validation on Company Management Inputs
description: Ensure that company management forms validate input fields correctly, disallow invalid data submission, and provide useful validation feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to company data creation or editing forms.
Enter invalid data formats such as empty required fields or invalid characters.
Attempt to submit the form.
Verify that form submission is blocked and appropriate validation error messages appear.

title: Middleware Request Processing for Authenticated Routes
description: Validate the middleware correctly processes and routes requests, ensuring only authenticated users access protected pages.

steps.description: Send requests to protected URLs without authentication.
Confirm middleware blocks access and redirects to login or returns appropriate response.
Send authenticated requests to protected URLs.
Confirm middleware allows access to authenticated users.
